reviewText:
(rocking rape and supernatural horror revenge murders) Ron (Ivan Judd) stops by sukubus (INC) - "Club Video Culto" (3629 Rue Wellington, Montral, QC H4G 1T9, Canada), looks at some things in the store and then goes into the beaded off adult section and comes out with two dvd's. The Video Club Girl (Jennifer June Chapman - burlesque persona aka Damiana Dolce) has been keeping an eye on him from the checkout station and she tells him he can have a third one for half price today...he had been checking out her impressive cleavage and seems confused so she clarifies a third "movie" for half price today...he thinks that is ok and goes and gets another one... pays and leaves...(she rolls her eyes)...when he gets back to his van a "police" woman is writing a ticket...."Nobody's innocent"
from my googleable IMDB list "Ghek Remembers Video Stores and their Employees in movies"
